definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Scroll down to read about the latest update, or just click here.
sentences.chinese: 滚动鼠标向下，阅读最新的更新，或者点击这里。

sentences.english: Hovering over the Chat Frame and using the mouse wheel will allow players to scroll through chat text.
sentences.chinese: ◦鼠标悬停在聊天框可以用鼠标滚轮卷动聊天记录了。

sentences.english: Hovering over the Chat Frame and using the mouse wheel will allow players to scroll through chat text.
sentences.chinese: ◦鼠标悬停在聊天框可以用鼠标滚轮卷动聊天记录了。

sentences.english: The mouse moves the pointer or cursor on the computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 将光标放在要添加新图框的位置，然后单击鼠标。

sentences.english: By going low-level, you can play back the individual components of a mouse click.
sentences.chinese: 通过进入低级，您可以回放一个鼠标点击分解动作。

sentences.english: Use the less dominant hand to move your computer mouse or write a letter.
sentences.chinese: 用较少用的手来操纵鼠标或写信。

sentences.english: “Soft” hover effects often support the navigation design by making browsing more pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 导航设计中的鼠标悬停效果会让浏览变得更愉快。

sentences.english: A classic example is mouse buttons.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型的示例就是鼠标键。

sentences.english: When I hover over each person, I want a rectangular box to appear.
sentences.chinese: 当鼠标停留在每个人身上时，我希望出现一个矩形框。

sentences.english: With the mouse button held down, you can use the mouse-wheel to change your movement speed.
sentences.chinese: 按下鼠标右键同时使用鼠标滚轮可以改变移动速度。

sentences.english: With the mouse button held down, you can use the mouse-wheel to change your movement speed.
sentences.chinese: 按下鼠标右键同时使用鼠标滚轮可以改变移动速度。

sentences.english: My mouse cursor is over here on the top right, now, I touch the cat.
sentences.chinese: 我们鼠标移到右上方时，我们摸了下猫。

sentences.english: Even I don't feel like moving my hand which holds the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 甚至握着鼠标的手都懒得挪一下位置。

sentences.english: You can redact a word simply by selecting it with your mouse cursor.
sentences.chinese: 只要通过简单地移动鼠标，就可以修订一个单词。

sentences.english: A mouse is a pointing device designed to be gripped by one hand.
sentences.chinese: 鼠标是为一只手抓握而设计的指示设备。

sentences.english: All references to mouse clicks assume use of a right-handed mouse.
sentences.chinese: 所有鼠标点击参考都假设是个右手鼠标。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
